thread.section_title: The Lucerne Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Hotel
thread.title_full: Fabulous Hotel - Review of The Lucerne Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: L W
title: Fabulous Hotel
text:
I really enjoyed my stay here. The staff was friendly. The hotel has been recently renovated - a great vintage vibe! Nice neighborhood - one block from Museum of Natural History. Great places to eat nearby. I will definitely stay here again! Loved it!!
Room Tip: Find a room opposite construction going on next door!! See more room tips
